name: Crossed Wires
description:
Story Background: 

After finishing your degree, you have no choice but to move back home to your small town while you wait for the pandemic to blow over. However, you receive a phone call from an old friend. It is up to you whether you want to rekindle your friendship.

A game about friendships and being there for your loved ones in hard times, coming soon!

A student game made for the University of Alberta's INT D 450 Class, by Voice Quacks Studios.

Programming: Emma Bajestani, Charffy Wang, Victor Lieu 

Writing: Bethany Gerlach, Matt Anderson

Audio: Matt Anderson

EP: EJ Meneses

Thank you for playing our beta version of Crossed Wires, we really appreciate it! Please fill out the following questions so we can improve the game further :) This form is entirely anonymous, so please don't be afraid to let us know what needs work-- be harsh if you need to!

https://forms.gle/P9BVM9qXX11nhhvA8
